body:
I started this new series on my channel called One Word Anime Reviews and I would like if it you guys could check it out. Please leave suggestions if you can, thanks.
1. https://youtu.be/mupDrcFhR54 - Manyuu Hikenchou
2. https://youtu.be/LIEbhU6ZttI - Code Geass
3. https://youtu.be/49uXf3g2mps - School Days
4. https://youtu.be/u3W8yaDegkY - Trinity Seven
5. http://youtu.be/IzzdqAeDqt0 - Akame ga Kill!
6. https://youtu.be/j7pXOo-HcxI - Steins;Gate
7. https://youtu.be/tG3FS8HE2ag - Highschool DxD
8. https://youtu.be/Bf7qUbhxHqQ - Date A Live
9. https://youtu.be/PuxFjR8jMNk - Sword Art Online
10. https://youtu.be/3fYuUednhrI - Boku no Pico
11. https://youtu.be/bC6qsRT1CMI - Nisekoi
12. https://youtu.be/bLTZO6P2658 - Angel Beats
13. http://youtu.be/P9QmcaX_4QA - Attack on Titan
14. https://youtu.be/yPK_cRTWth4  - Daily Lives of Highschool Boys
15. http://youtu.be/y1XAjoDsVQ4 - Tokyo Ghoul
16. https://youtu.be/d_l8BhVzHC0 - Madoka Magica
17. https://youtu.be/L7rAvL4djK0 - One Punch Man
18. https://youtu.be/bJuMDwlQ9Y0 - Absolute Duo
Please leave a comment for any anime suggestions you would like to see in the future. Thanks

replies.body:

Can you review Daily Life of High School Boys? If you haven't watched it, I am pretty sure you will enjoy this
replies.body_tagged:
I like your reviews because they are so short and simple ^-^ Maybe doing some in-depth reviews later? I dont know its your choice but its interesting.


Can you review Daily Life of High School Boys? If you haven't watched it, I am pretty sure you will enjoy this

replies.body:
In-depth reviews in my opinion don't really seem to appealing to me and since I usually prefer short and simple reviews I started doing them myself. I try to keep the things I do limited to things I enjoy so I don't force myself to make them. I forced myself to continue series in the past which is what lead me to almost quit youtube all together. maybe something in the future I will make more in-depth ones but for now I am going to be sticking to short and simple ones. Also thanks for the support.

As for Daily Life of High School Boys I will consider it, I have to watch the series first and I haven't had a lot of free time lately.
replies.body_tagged:

Also thanks for the support.

replies.body:
Really enjoyed your review man (sorry if this was a bump but I just realized in one of my alerts.) Liked and subbed! and mind if you do One Punch Man? I like these reviews because it breifly summarizes what the anime is without giving spoilers and they are pretty comical in a way.


One thing I suggest is make your voice a little bit clearer. I had a bit of trouble understanding what you were saying in some of your vids but other than that, your reviews are great so keep it up!
